str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From philos; to be a friend to (an individual or an object), i.e. Have affection for; specially, to kiss.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A votive offering, a thing devoted to God; a curse, the thing cursed. From anatithemai; a ban or excommunicated.
Of Chaldee origin; maranatha, i.e. An exclamation of the approaching divine judgment.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: Of Chaldee origin; maranatha, i.e. An exclamation of the approaching divine judgment.
